page.title: 18BARKSTON ASH R.C. CHURCH
page.content: The Catholic church is 131 years old and is built of sandstone. It is positioned just out of the village in a complex called Scarthingwell Park. Father Moxon has been in charge since 1983. He holds one Mass per day and approximatley 5 weddings monthly. He has no assistants and no choir. There is an average weekly congregation of sixty people. The church plays a very active role in the village and especially in connection with the school where the Father helps to choose teachers,is chairman of the school governors and takes classes. Father Moxon is also connected with Selby coal field. In the village he runs a keep fit class and judo both aimed at middle aged villagers.
